archimate:Assessment.name: Number of preventative actions completed
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Tracks the number of preventative actions derived from an RCA that have been completed.
Rationale: Problem Reports are opened for all MIM's after their resolution. Multiple Change Requests are an output from the Problems.
Jiri Paloch: Deemed not feasible. Identified a process to be better suitable: Attach Problem Record Number to Crisis Teams Channel.
